name: Teach2000 Document
summary: Learn about .T2K files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: T2K files are used for saving memorization questions and can be run as a test in Teach2000. They can also be used by teachers for creating .T2KT files, which are distributed as digital tests for students.

description: Test document created by Teach2000, a memory training application; saves a list of questions and answers in an XML format; may include free form or multiple choice questions.
